name: What Remains (parelaxel)
description:
A first person puzzle game exploring the topic of climate change,  travel across 3 different levels to shut down an abandoned power plant which is slowly destroying the environment.

This game was made as a college project for Games Art. There are some bugs but nothing game breaking most of the time and the game is perfectly playable.

(might not run well on less powerful computers)

Some of the assets used in the game are available for free on my Sketchfab: https://sketchfab.com/parelaxel
